title: Skin Idea for Cassiopeia - Dragon Princess Cassiopeia

embed.description: League of Legends fanart for another skin idea of mine. Cassiopeia originally uses poison spells, but I think her kit could easily be switched to fire based attacks. Done in Adobe Photoshop 7.0

body:
"When you think about it, her poison spells should be really easy to switch to fire based attacks.
Her posion DoT works the same as Brand's fire DoT after all and her Ult is going to be a cone of fire that chars her opponents.

The design is inspired by indian and chinese culture. At first I had thought about giving her armor and fire for hair, which would be cool, but doesn't fit the flair of Cassiopeia. (skantily dressed) :3
I put a lot of attention into staying true to the champion and hitting all important landmarks.
The bangs, the headgear and the objects hanging from her waist.

Please upvote and comment if you'd like to support the idea." 

Credit to Shockowaffel for the skin Idea and splash art! (I'm just the one who share the skin concept x3)

replies.body: I feel like "Priestess" would be a better title than "Princess", but the image looks nice.
I want this skin to have a Disco Ball to appear during her recall and she starts dancing, until she's had enough and sets the mirrored ball ablaze. It would be quite the Disco Inferno.
Her W should instead be spots of lava.
Nice concept bro It sure would be very nice!
I love skins that make want to play a champion on a regular basis.

Looks really nice!

I especially like the idea of fire particles; it'd be cool to have a Cass skin where the particles look explosive and bombastic.
Thank you guys for your comment and support! I'll make my best to promote this skin concept to Riot! I know it sound impossible, but i really want it!
also could you record yourself making the next skin art you do? and post to something
The art isn't mine, It's credited to Shockowaffel at the end of the post! But I should give your request to the artist xD

I just liek teh dragon themed skins

I secretly want "Dragon Princess" Nami to be a thing, like Gyarados even though he's water/flying :(

I LIKE YOUR COMMENT!!! That's a point i forgot to talk about! All good skin concept made for "snaky like" character are give to Nami, but Riot should give some to Cassiopeia! Also, instead of Dragon Princess, I think Riot should make Nami the next one to have an "Atlantean" theme skin after Syndra and Fizz.
But a "Gyarados like" skin concept is kind of very great Idea!
Who gives a shit if Game Freak officially gave the Water/Flying type to Gyarados. If it looks like a dragon, it's a dragon. Like Charizard.
this already has been made i have seen this a while ago, you gave credit for the idea, but im pretty sure this skin concept  was copied from somewhere else
The credit is to the artist on DeviantArt but if your right, it means that there's many people that want this skin in the game and Riot should really make it because it will be popular.

I know that feel bro {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}
But i think that Riot also make new skin to promote champions and to make them more popular

It doesn't matter if the champs have a high play rate or not. Skins are made if they suit the Themeatic that Riot is working on. They always have ideas floating around for various skins on various champs, some get made and some don't.
Sion got a legendary skin "recently" and he honestly wasn't played _all_ that much. There's hope yet :)
I don't even Cass, but that's a sweet concept.
Fire Good
I will always upvote this skin concept
I love this skin concept for Cass!
It would be nice, but ask your request to the artist on DeviantArt! It's not my art up there xD
